meanings.definition: A category or class of things with common characteristics
meanings.sent1: There are many different kinds of animals in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: She likes all kinds of music, from classical to pop.
meanings.sent3: I saw a unicorn and a dragon at the zoo - the magical kinds!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a warm blanket on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the different kinds of shapes using colorful examples.

meanings.definition: A particular type or variety of something
meanings.sent1: The store sells various kinds of ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent2: He collects rare kinds of stamps from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome had a collection of tiny mushroom kinds.
meanings.sent4: His kindness towards strangers was a beacon of light in the community.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted all kinds of landscapes, from mountains to beaches.
